text: Piergiorgio Bressani (10 June 1929 â€“ 3 June 2022) was an Italian politician. He was a member of the Christian Democracy party. He was in the Chamber of Deputies from 1963 to 1986. He was also Secretary of the Council of Ministers from 1979 to 1981. Bressani died in Udine on 3 June 2022 at the age of 92. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Italian mayors Category:Politicians from Friuli-Venezia Giulia
title: Piergiorgio Bressani
